pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā sikkhamānā thullanandaṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā upasampadaṃ yāci.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.4: “sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpeti na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.5: Atha kho sā sikkhamānā bhikkhunīnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.8: ‘sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī’ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpessati na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.10: ‘sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī’ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpeti na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karotī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.13: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.14: ‘sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī’ti vatvā, neva vuṭṭhāpessati na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.16: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:1.17: “Yā pana bhikkhunī sikkhamānaṃ—‘sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi, evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmī’ti vatvā, sā pacchā anantarāyikinī neva vuṭṭhāpeyya na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ kareyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.7: Sace me tvaṃ, ayye, cīvaraṃ dassasi evāhaṃ taṃ vuṭṭhāpessāmīti
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc77:2.1.15: “Neva vuṭṭhāpessāmi na vuṭṭhāpanāya ussukkaṃ karissāmī”ti dhuraṃ nikkhittamatte āpatti pācittiyassa.
